title: Introduction
description: Welcome and introduction to the training module.  Emphasis on the importance of following along and noting important details.

title: Process Overview
description: High-level explanation of the process that will be covered in the training. Preparation for the step-by-step guide.

title: Step-by-Step Guide - Part 1
description: Detailed explanation of the first part of the process.  This section might cover initial setup or foundational concepts.

title: Step-by-Step Guide - Part 2
description: Continuation of the step-by-step guide, focusing on the next stage of the process. This could involve applying the learned concepts or practical exercises.

title: Step-by-Step Guide - Part 3
description: Final part of the step-by-step guide, covering the remaining aspects of the process. This might include advanced techniques or troubleshooting.

title: Summary and Review
description: Brief recap of the key concepts and steps covered in the training.  Opportunity to ask questions and reinforce learning.
